page.title: 04WASTE DISPOSAL
page.content: accident.At the dump they look for the pipe that is sticking out of the ground, left by the men driving the bulldozers.They connect the pipe to the tanker and before they empty the fluid they must look at the wind sock nearby to make sure they stand {UP {WIND}so they cannot breathe in dangerous fumes.They empty the contents of the tanker and then block the end of the tube.Tyres are left in the rubbish to make air holes for the pipes.If someone has an accident and gets the dangerous liquid on them,there is a cold water shower nearby to wash it off quickly.Five wardens work there.The dangerous liquid dumping area is a long way into the {CLEANAWAY}site so people cannot get there without being seen.
